meanings.definition: In a bad-tempered or irritable manner.
meanings.sent1: She answered crabbedly when asked about her day.
meanings.sent2: He spoke crabbedly to the customer service representative.
meanings.sent3: Despite feeling crabbedly, she couldn't help but smile at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The old man glared crabbedly at the noisy children playing outside.
meanings.sent5: The cat hissed crabbedly at the unfamiliar dog approaching.

meanings.definition: Difficult to read or decipher, as handwriting.
meanings.sent1: The crabbedly written note was hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: Her crabbedly scrawled signature puzzled the bank teller.
meanings.sent3: The crabbedly written recipe left the chef scratching his head.
meanings.sent4: The crabbedly drawn map led them in circles all afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The crabbedly written exam question caused confusion among the students.
